name: Preparing for Year End 2020 and Year Beginning 2021
content: The IRS provides updated tax rates and changes how taxable income is calculated each year. This year changes will more significant than in the past several due to Tax Reform and the continued changes that affect the new form W-4 and tax calculations in 2021\. This webinar will assist the seasoned payroll professional on new legislation that needs to be considered. This webinar will also assist the beginner around W-2 processing W-2 to understand all the boxes on the Form W-2 and what should be reported. A brief overview of year-end and W-2 best practices will also be discussed. We will review the new W-2 reporting deadlines, penalties, and updates on how we process the W-2 and W-4\. Why Should You Attend » Details of how to close the 2020 year to make sure your W-2’s are correct and 941 reconciliation happens correctly. » Review box by box of the W-2 and how tax reform has changed W-2 reporting. » Most up to date legislation releases » Calculating tax in 2021 and what the new form W-4 tells us. » State-specific W-2 reporting and what you need to know Areas Covered in the Session » W-2 Requirements » W-2 box by Box review » Updated legislation to consider for W-2 and 2021 » State by State discussion of special W-2 considerations » Year-End and W-2 best Practices » Taxation in 2021 and the new form W-4 » New year legislation Who Will Benefit » Payroll Executives/Managers/Administrators/Professionals/Practitioners/Entry Level Personnel » Human Resources Executives/Managers/Administrators » Accounting Personnel » Business Owners/Executive Officers/Operations and Departmental Managers » Lawmakers » Attorneys/Legal Professionals » Any individual or entity that must deal with the complexities and requirements of Payroll compliance issues To Register (or) for more details please click on this below link: https://bit.ly/3qZc6eg Email: support@abideedict.com Toll Free No:1-844-511-8858 Tel: +1-913-871-1466
